Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package moby-buildx for versions less than 0.7.1-16
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package moby-buildx for versions less than 0.7.1-16. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-buildx is earlier than 0.7.1-16, affected by CVE-2022-21698
